name: Good Doggo (itch)
description:
Teach your good doggo to be the goodest doggo ever! Balance treats, toss them, and chomp them! The more you chomp the more you level up so you can chomp even hard

History/About:
Good Doggo was made by Cozy Game Pals. It’s available on Desktop and mobile. You can play it for free, or you can buy the premium version for extra doggos and upgrades. We worked hard on this, and buying Premium mode helps support us making more games in the future. Thanks for the support! <3

Controls:
Full controller and keyboard support.
Move left and right to balance and catch treats.

Full Credits:
Cozy Game Pals are:
Bryan Singh - Code 
Crista Castro - Art
